com.escape.games.model
Class FloatPage

java.lang.Object
  com.escape.games.model.FloatPageImpl
      com.escape.games.model.FloatPage

public class FloatPage
extends FloatPageImpl

Staging area for a single vertex attribute. Attribute can be 2-tuple, 3-tuple, or 4-tuple, enforced on ctor. You must use the corresponding putXd() to add data.

Author:
escape-llc
